name: Ångst-RÖM's RAM Page
description:
Ångst-RÖM's RAM Page

Ludum Dare 36 submission

Join Ångst-RÖM on his quest to liberate his computer from NSA spyware and

replace Macindows with the GNOO / Gelato System.

License

Code is released under the ISC license. Graphics and audio are CC-BY, except music is only free for non-commercial use. See README for more details.

Credits

Graphics and audio by Matthew Petry.

Music by Theo de Raadt.

Puzzle design by Phil St. Antoine.
